UndoRedo - Interface in org.openide.awt
Undo and Redo manager for top components and workspace elements.
UndoRedo.Empty - Class in org.openide.awt
Deprecated.
Use UndoRedo.NONE rather than instantiating this.
UndoRedo.Manager - Class in org.openide.awt
An undo manager which fires a change event each time it consumes a new undoable edit.
UndoRedo.Provider - Interface in org.openide.awt
Components that provide UndoRedo shall announce that by implementing this provider interface.
